content.title: Uses
content.description: Fruit pulp is edible and used to make chutneys and curries. Fruit pulp has a sweet acidic taste due to tartaric acid and reducing sugars. The pulp is used for seasoning, in prepared foods, to flavour confections, curries and sauces, and as a major ingredient in juices and other beverages. In addition, it contains phenolic compounds, cardiac glycosides, tartaric acid, the mucilage, pectin, fatty acids and As, Ca, Cu, Fe, Mn, Mg.
